About Life College

Expect something exceptional ... for this is what lifecollege is. A conscious organisation delivering a better world for all through great experiences.

Since 1987, lifecollege.org has been a global organisation that works with individuals and organisations by creating positively for the world. Let us look at your new future - your future after COVID 19.

We work with the energy and vision of the whole organisation/company/community, from visioning and organisational development to delvering the modern training and coaching needed to inspire and progress, online and face-face (Coronavirus permitting). By understanding the personalities and motivation of your people, customers and suppliers, new management and leadership skills, powerful presentations and communication skills evolve and become the insprirational resource they should be.

As we said, lifecollege.org exists to create a better world. We are visionaries, adventurers, explorers and creators of what's new in the world today. We are at the forefront of leadership, new paradigm business, adventure, risk-taking, and stirring humanity into its greater potential. Let us look at your new future - your future after COVID 19.

Our exceptional team of trainers,

coaches, mentors and facilitators joined lifecollege from a wide variety of fields, have years of expertise under their belts and joined to make a difference to your future.

Ian Lewis, FRSA FInstLM Founder / Director

Ian's passion is the realization of corporate, community and human [life-] vision. He achieves this by helping people, communities and organisations discover and deliver their true visions, values and greatness from within.

He studied at Durham and Bristol Universities and was made a Fellow of the Royal Society for Arts, Industry and Commerce for his contribution to evolving leadership development and training in the UK. He is also a Fellow of the Institute for Leadership and Management. Ian has lectured on Human Resource Development and Leadership issues to international audiences at universities in Tokyo, Geneva, Budapest, Sofia and Paris and works with global and national corporations, national and local governments, the UN and UNESCO.

In the UK Ian is active coordinating the Campaign for Adventure and by 'Clerking' the UK All Party Parliamentary Group on Adventure, Risk and Enterprise. He chairs a number of national committees and advises on training and education within UK government. Ian is a Founder Director of 'Lifecollege.org' an innovative business leadership, business and personal development academy.

Pippa Lee MD / President

Pippa is Managing Director / President of lifecollege, co-founder of 'glipworld', a transformative trainer and Pipossibility coach. She specialises in presentation skills training and coaching, working with individuals one-to-one as well as running courses globally (eg. Chartered Institute of Marketing Presentation Master Class, Reckitt Benckiser Executive Presentations).

Previously, she had a 15 year career in sales, sales management and sales training as regional director for the South of England for a financial services company and then as national training manager in a related industry. She focused on public speaking, presenting and coaching for a global marketing organisation through seminar and conference work, presenting internationally to audiences ranging from small groups to many thousands in size and including MCâ€™ing, informational, motivational, persuasive and inspirational style presentations.

Other Projects & Visions We've Sourced

In 2000 we created the Campaign for Adventure www.campaignforadventure.com to protect inspiration, healthy inspiring lifestyles and adventure in society. "The campaign seeks to show that life is best approached in a spirit of exploration, adventure and enterprise; to influence and better inform attitudes towards being adventurous; to build wider recognition that chance, unforeseen circumstances and uncertainty are inescapable features of life and that absolute safety is unachievable; and to demonstrate that sensible education and preparation enable an appropriate balance to be achieved between risk & safety and achievement & opportunity." HRH Prince Philip is patron of Campaign for Adventure.

Lifecollege.org sourced Campaign for Adventure, as a charitable foundation, to protect the right of people to try out new experiences - in families, oneself, education, community, enterprise, politics, environment, sports, law, arts, health, fitness, recreation...everything in life! Because successful people always appear willing to find, take and live inspirational risks and adventures. By finding and knowing true their potential people live each amazing moment of their lives in creative collaboration with all their possibilities. This is so right Lifecollege lives it all!

In May 2015 lifecollege partnered with the Genius Company & the Visionary Network to host the Genius World Conference with the purpose of celebrating social & business innovation. This event brought together genius innovators from 6 countries -- spanning business, leadership, education, the natural world, technology, social innovation, and more - to innovate a new landscape of business and leadership in the world. For more information on this event, visit Genius World Conference.

More information coming soon on other lifecollege projects such as:
  • Vida Mountain Resort in Costa Rica - this is special!
  • Sustainable Tourism projects in Romania, Bulgaria, Poland, Costa Rica and Malawi - these are hard but rewarding!
  • The European Year of Lifelong Learning - this is so worthwhile!
  • Network2000 which produced 2000 new women leaders - this is beautiful!
